thread.title: Awesome view, room and staff!
thread.title_full: Awesome view, room and staff! - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BLAKE68
title: Awesome view, room and staff!
text: Father and daughter week in Manhattan... We picked a 26th floor Sky view and we're so impressed! Due to recent snow the rooftop was closed and at times the 2 elevators ran slowly, but such is life in NYC. Convenient to everything and close to the subway. We will definitely be back! Thank you Arlo Nomad for a memorable week and especially West and Taylor!
